Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy of Pt\BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3\Pt cells indicates that both mass and charge-transfer influence the electrode kinetics of the interfacial reactions.
Titulo: Interfacial polarization characteristics of Pt vertical bar BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 vertical bar Pt cells at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Charge-transfer appears to dominate the electrode kinetics when the partial pressure of oxygen is sufficiently high, whereas mass transfer seems to be rate limiting at low oxygen partial pressures.
Titulo: Interfacial polarization characteristics of Pt vertical bar BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 vertical bar Pt cells at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Under the influence of an applied de bias, concentration polarization at the cathode is more severe than that at the anode.
Titulo: Interfacial polarization characteristics of Pt vertical bar BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 vertical bar Pt cells at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: In a H-2-containing atmosphere, the electrode kinetics seem to, be limited primarily by charge-transfer.
Titulo: Interfacial polarization characteristics of Pt vertical bar BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 vertical bar Pt cells at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Further, water vapor has a significant effect on the electrode kinetics.
Titulo: Interfacial polarization characteristics of Pt vertical bar BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 vertical bar Pt cells at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: In an O-2-containing atmosphere, the introduction of 3 volume percent (v/o) H2O dramatically increases the interfacial resistances.
Titulo: Interfacial polarization characteristics of Pt vertical bar BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 vertical bar Pt cells at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: In contrast, in a H-2-containing atmosphere the presence of 3 v/o H2O significantly reduces the interfacial resistances.
Titulo: Interfacial polarization characteristics of Pt vertical bar BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 vertical bar Pt cells at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Overall, the interfacial resistances are the factors limiting the performance of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells based on BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 electrolytes.
Titulo: Interfacial polarization characteristics of Pt vertical bar BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 vertical bar Pt cells at intermediate temperatures

Sentencas: Minimizing polarization resistance arising from both charge and mass transfer is the key to achieving high-performance solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Interfacial polarization characteristics of Pt vertical bar BaCe0.8Gd0.2O3 vertical bar Pt cells at intermediate temperatures
